english.segment1: If it weren't for you Lord, I don't know where I'd be. I could fill the hours, but never fill the need. I would still be searching looking for the truth. But I found a new life, that only comes from you
english.segment2: Everything I do let it be in your name. Let it be for your glory let it be for you. Everything I say let it be in your name. Let it be to your glory let it be for your sake. Cuz I wanna please you in everything I do
english.segment3: I want the world to see you, when they look at me. I want the world to hear you in every word I speak. So let my words be your words and my actions too. So they'll find the new life that I have found in you
english.segment4: Everything I do let it be in your name. Let it be for your glory let it be for you. Everything I say let it be in your name. Let it be to your glory let it be for your sake. Cuz I wanna please you in everything I do
english.segment5: You filled up my empty heart. You give me strength so that I can go on. You're the reason that my life has changed. That's why I say
english.segment6: Everything I do let it be in your name. Let it be for your glory let it be for you. Everything I say let it be in your name. Let it be to your glory let it be for your sake. Cuz I wanna please you in everything I do. (repeat 2X)
